title: English Pewter Company 11oz Whisky Glass Tumbler with Monogram Initial - Personalised Gift with Your Choice of Initial (K) [MON111]
features: Handmade by our master craftsmen and women in Sheffield, England
11oz old fashioned whisky rocks glass tumbler
Featuring a superb handcast pewter badge in the style of a wax seal
CHOOSING YOUR INITIAL - Simply click on the drop down box labelled 'Size' and select the initial of your choice
Supplied in a luxury velvet bag and gift box complete with the iconic English Pewter Company logo
description: Product Description Monogram Whiskey Whisky Glass Tumbler Personalised Gift With Pewter Initial Part of our very popular Monogram Collection Firm favourite for those looking for a quality personalised gift for that special someone Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries and more, each glass is available with a handmade pewter initial of your choice. Each 310ml Whisky Glass is presented in its very own black velvet bag which is then placed in one of our elegant cream and black gift boxes The video showcases the product in use. English Pewter Company Merchant video Manufacturers Of Luxury Pewter Giftware Years Of Skill & Craftsmanship, Made In Sheffield, England Since 1977, our pewter products have been proudly handcrafted in the legendary city of Sheffield—a place where craftsmanship and quality have stood the test of time. For centuries, Sheffield has been renowned for its world-class manufacturing, and we’re honoured to be part of that legacy. Over the years, our creations have appeared in TV shows and movies, earning prestigious accolades like the Gift of the Year award.
